verses.t: God, who{G3588} at sundry times{G4181} and{G2532} in divers manners{G4187} spake{G2980} in time past{G3819} unto the fathers{G3588} by{G1722} the prophets{G3588},

Hath{G2980} in{G1909} these{G3778} last{G2078} days{G3588} spoken{G2980} unto us{G2254} by{G1722} his Son{G5207}, whom{G3739} he hath appointed{G5087} heir{G2818} of all things{G3956}, by{G1223} whom{G3739} also{G2532} he made{G4160} the worlds{G3588};

Who{G3739} being{G5607} the brightness{G541} of{G3588} his glory{G1391}, and{G2532} the express image{G5481} of{G3588} his{G846} person{G5287}, and{G5037} upholding{G5342} all things{G3956} by the word{G3588} of{G3588} his{G846} power{G3588}, when he had{G4160} by{G1223} himself{G1438} purged{G2512} our{G2257} sins{G3588}, sat down{G2523} on{G1722} the right hand{G1188} of the Majesty{G3588} on{G1722} high{G5308};
Being made{G1096} so much{G5118} better{G2909} than the angels{G3588}, as{G3745} he hath by inheritance obtained{G2816} a more excellent{G1313} name{G3686} than{G3844} they{G846}.

For{G1063} unto which{G5101} of the angels{G3588} said he{G2036} at any time{G4218}, Thou{G4771} art{G1488} my{G3450} Son{G5207}, this day{G4594} have{G1080} I{G1473} begotten{G1080} thee{G4571}? And{G2532} again{G3825}, I{G1473} will be{G2071} to{G1519} him{G846} a Father{G3962}, and{G2532} he{G846} shall be{G2071} to{G1519} me{G3427} a Son{G5207}?

And{G1161} again{G3825}, when{G3752} he bringeth in{G1521} the firstbegotten{G4416} into{G1519} the world{G3588}, he saith{G3004}, And{G2532} let{G4352} all{G3956} the angels{G32} of God{G2316} worship{G4352} him{G846}.
And{G2532} of{G4314} the angels{G3588} he saith{G3004}, Who{G3588} maketh{G4160} his{G846} angels{G3588} spirits{G4151}, and{G2532} his{G846} ministers{G3588} a flame{G5395} of fire{G4442}.

But{G1161} unto{G4314} the Son{G3588} he saith, Thy{G4675} throne{G3588}, O God{G3588}, is for{G1519} ever{G3588} and ever{G3588}: a sceptre{G4464} of righteousness{G2118} is the sceptre{G3588} of{G3588} thy{G4675} kingdom{G932}.

Thou hast loved{G25} righteousness{G1343}, and{G2532} hated{G3404} iniquity{G458}; therefore{G1223} God{G3588}, even thy{G4675} God{G3588}, hath anointed{G5548} thee{G4571} with the oil{G1637} of gladness{G20} above{G3844} thy{G4675} fellows{G3353}.

And{G2532}, Thou{G4771}, Lord{G2962}, in{G2596} the beginning{G746} hast laid the foundation{G2311} of the earth{G3588}; and{G2532} the heavens{G3588} are{G1526} the works{G2041} of{G3588} thine{G4675} hands{G5495}:
They{G846} shall perish{G622}; but{G1161} thou{G4771} remainest{G1265}; and{G2532} they all{G3956} shall wax old{G3822} as doth{G5613} a garment{G2440};

And{G2532} as{G5616} a vesture{G4018} shalt thou fold{G1667} them{G846} up{G1667}, and{G2532} they shall be changed{G236}: but{G1161} thou{G4771} art{G1488} the same{G846}, and{G2532} thy{G4675} years{G3588} shall{G1587} not{G3756} fail{G1587}.

But{G1161} to{G4314} which{G5101} of the angels{G3588} said he{G2046} at any time{G4218}, Sit{G2521} on{G1537} my{G3450} right hand{G1188}, until{G2193} I make{G5087} thine{G4675} enemies{G2190} thy{G4675} footstool{G5286}?
Are they{G1526} not{G3780} all{G3956} ministering{G3010} spirits{G4151}, sent forth{G649} to{G1519} minister{G1248} for{G1223} them who{G3588} shall be{G3195} heirs{G2816} of salvation{G4991}?
